description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. How long can you survive the zombie apocalypse? Kill zombies with 6 powerful weapons and over 20 unique perks! Play never ending waves of increasing difficulty. See who can survive the longest with high score leader boards.
